item.title: 真有你的啊2K 新增xcom2无法启动解决方法一则[0-50]
item.description:
真有你的啊2K 新增xcom2无法启动解决方法一则 本帖最后由 水边井 于 2020-5-14 19:37 编辑
xcom2突然搞的蜜汁更新，结果现在所有人连游戏都进不去了，steam讨论区已经爆炸了。
天知道2k又在折腾什么。
目前的解决方法是新建
..\steamapps\common\XCOM 2\XCom2-WarOfTheChosen\Binaries\Win64\Launcher\ModLauncherWPF.exe
的快捷方式
然后属性目标后面加上
-noRedScreens -review即可
Here's a temporary way to play the game.
-Create a shortcut for ModLauncherWPF.exe
-Right-click the shortcut, go to Properties.
-Under Shortcut, Target, add in "-noRedScreens -review" behind "...\Launcher\ModLauncherWPF.exe"
-it should look something like this, "...\steamapps\common\XCOM 2\Binaries\Win64\Launcher\ModLauncherWPF.exe" -noRedScreens -review
Modlauncher should launch fine and you should be able to play the game with mods normally.
-noRedScreens
starting the game via the shortcut will cause it to launch in debug mode. debug mode will have this annoying red screen thingy that will distract you from game play. this line helps to prevent that.
-review
如前所述，通过快捷方式启动游戏将导致其以调试模式启动。这将使游戏正常启动。
